remarks: Lemma for ~ hsmex .  Clear ` I ` hypothesis and extend previous result by dominance.  Note that this could be substantially strengthened, e.g. using the weak Hartogs function, but all we need here is that there be *some* dominating ordinal.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 14-Feb-2015.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jun-2015.)
statement:
hsmexlem.f $e |- F = OrdIso ( _E , B ) $.
hsmexlem.g $e |- G = OrdIso ( _E , U_ a e. A B ) $.
hsmexlem3 $p |- ( ( ( A ~<_* D /\ C e. On ) /\ A. a e. A ( B e. ~P On /\ dom F e. C ) ) -> dom G e. ( har ` ~P ( D X. C ) ) ) $.
$d A a $.
$d C a $.
